@graph.name: Catty RO-Crate HelloWorld
@graph.description: Minimal reproducible Research Object Crate demonstrating Java + Jena SPARQL integration with real Wikidata entity retrieval

@graph.name: Catty RO-Crate HelloWorld JAR
@graph.description: Built executable JAR artifact from compiled Java sources. Queries Wikidata for software package entity information and outputs Turtle RDF.

license.name: GNU Affero General Public License v3.0

@graph.name: Docker container definition for Catty RO-Crate HelloWorld
@graph.description: Dockerfile that builds containerized executable for RO-Crate

@graph.name: RO-Crate HelloWorld Java Source
@graph.description: Main Java class implementing SPARQL query to Wikidata for software package entity retrieval

@graph.name: Wikidata SPARQL Query
@graph.description: SPARQL query that searches Wikidata for software package entities

@graph.name: Maven Build Configuration
@graph.description: Maven POM file defining project structure and dependencies

@graph.name: Wikidata Query Results (Turtle)
@graph.description: Turtle RDF produced by RoCrateHelloWorld from executing wikidata-rocrate-query.rq against the Wikidata SPARQL endpoint. Contains retrieved entity data including URI, label, and description. Includes provenance comments with generation timestamp, query hash, and execution time.

@graph.name: Reproducible Build and Run Script
@graph.description: Shell script that builds the JAR with Maven and executes the SPARQL query against Wikidata. Provides automated end-to-end execution with verification of outputs.

@graph.name: RO-Crate Provenance Documentation
@graph.description: Documentation of query execution details, tool versions, build information, and reproducibility steps. Provides evidence of actual execution against the Wikidata SPARQL endpoint.

@graph.name: RO-Crate Improvements Summary
@graph.description: Summary of all improvements made to address code review feedback. Documents changes to strengthen evidence of actual execution and resolve internal inconsistencies.

@graph.name: Reproducibility and Canonical Artifacts Improvements
@graph.description: Comprehensive documentation of improvements made to achieve reproducible builds, canonical artifacts, and adherence to industry standards. Covers Maven, Java/Jena, RO-Crate modeling, Docker containerization, and directory structure improvements.

@graph.name: Summary of Reproducibility Improvements
@graph.description: Concise summary of all changes made to address reproducibility and canonical artifacts issues. Provides quick reference for files modified, standards compliance, verification steps, and issue resolution status.

@graph.name: Reproducibility Implementation Checklist
@graph.description: Verification checklist confirming all improvements from code review have been implemented. Covers Maven build, Java/Jena execution, RO-Crate modeling, Docker containerization, and directory structure issues with completion status tracking.

@graph.name: Quick Start Guide
@graph.description: User-friendly guide for getting started with the improved Catty RO-Crate HelloWorld project. Covers quick start options, understanding outputs, verification steps, troubleshooting, and next steps for exploring reproducible builds and RO-Crate features.
